name: Paul Dean Does His Laundry
description:
This is a simple, stupid game where Paul Dean does his laundry, based on that one snapchat where Paul Dean tried to do his laundry.

There are two modes, one where Paul Dean has a limited time of 60 seconds to do his laundry, and one where Paul Dean has unlimited time to do his laundry.

To do Paul Dean's laundry, click the rapidly moving piece of laundry in the right place to send it up into the open washing machine.

Can you assist Paul Dean with his laundry? Only time and Paul Dean and his laundry will tell.
